definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[תלל]] (appar. √ of foll.; NH [[תֵּל]] heap, [[תְּלוֹלִית]] hill; Targum:J [[תָּלִיל]] lofty; Ar. tal=a, Syr. telo0 mound; = (perhaps) OAram. [[תלי]] CIS:ii. No. 111 Lzb:386 SAC:120; Jen in Brock:Syr.Lex. thinks [[תֵּל]] As. loan-word from tîlu, ruin-heep, mound).
